title: Science Competency Enhancement Program Using Ontology-Based Personalized e-Learning Systems

context.prior_knowledge: Basic science knowledge and experience using e-learning systems
context.additional_context: A short-term training program for in-service professionals to enhance practical competencies in science through an ontology-based personalized learning system. Primarily consists of offline activities implementable in resource-constrained technology environments centered on smartphones.

learning_goals: Learners can explain core science concepts with over 80% accuracy using personalized learning paths provided by an ontology-based system.
Learners can identify and apply at least three science case studies aligned with their learning style and job requirements via system recommendations.
Learners can establish customized learning plans that reduce individual learning gaps by 50% or more by analyzing formative assessment results.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
